summary: A man is accused of sexual harassment by his former lover and he has to prove his innocence in order to restore his dignity.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kareena Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra|Amrish Puri|Paresh Rawal|Annu Kapoor|Suresh Bhagwat|Kamal Chopra|Firoz Irani|Dinesh Lamba|Anil Nagrath|Juliette Navis|Preeti Puri|Vivek Shauq|Upasna Singh
keywords: lawyer|south africa|resignation|sexual harassment|older man younger woman relationship
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas), Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla (as Mustan)
title: Aitraaz
